metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33067 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Lrzip v0.651 was discovered to contain multiple invalid arithmetic shifts via the functions get_magic in lrzip.c and Predictor::init in libzpaq/libzpaq.cpp. These vulnerabilities allow attackers to cause a Denial of Service via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: lrzip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
zpaq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
